content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a secondary conflict that remains unresolved at the end of the passage?

choices.label: Muriel does not feel the same way about Richard as he does about her.
Mildred has a second letter from Muriel that she is withholding.
Muriel’s parents have forbidden her from leaving the house.
Muriel’s parents do not wish for her to see Richard any longer.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
